title: S2 Ep22: The Yrjo Jahnsson award
itunes:title: The Yrjo Jahnsson award
description: The award is given to the best European economist under 45. This year, Oriana Bandiera of LSE and Imran Rasul of UCL share the prize. They talk to Tim Phillips about their work, and #whateconomistsreallydo.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
